sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")
    br
    br
    br
    h1 休假申請完成
    div
      p 審核流程
      p 職務代理人：蔡奇宏
      p ↓
      p 主任：許素朱
    .recButton(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
      router-link(to='/leave/Record' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") 查看休假紀錄

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            color: {
            but: "#333333",
            bgc: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
h1,p {
    color: #FFF;
    margin: 20px;
}



.circleButton {
  background-color: #A78E70;
  border: none;
  padding: 25px;
  font-size: 30px;
  height: 150px;
  width: 150px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border-radius: 50%;
  line-height: 100px;
  transition: 0.6s;
  position: relative;
  top: 10%;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.circleButton:hover {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4);
}
.recButton {
  border: none;
  padding: 25px;
  font-size: 20px;
  width: 200px;
  border-radius: 5%;
  line-height: 30px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  transition: 0.6s;
  position: relative;
  top: 10%;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.recButton:hover {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4);
}
</style>
